import React from 'react' const Lists = ({movieList,setMovieList}) => { return (
{movieList.map((movie) => ( //

    {movie.title}

    Star rating
    {movie.average}
    Rating
    {movie.average}
    Year
    {movie.releaseDate}
    Runtime
    {""}
    Cast
    {"movie.cast"}
))}
) } export default Lists;
